name.baseName: Soil In Situ Remediation ; Soil Bioventilation ; Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
土壤原位修复;土壤生物通风;到场的设备和材料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 将所需材料运输至现场
Transportation of required materials to the site

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The contaminated area was located 600 m from a river shore in the northern part of the prov-ince of Quebec， Canada.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Consumption of diesel gasoline for transportation of equipment and materials to project sites
消耗柴油汽油将设备与材料运输到项目现场
technology.technologicalApplicability: This soil remediation process, known as soil bioventilation, is intended for the decontamination of polluted sites particularly those proximal to sensitive ecosystems such as river shores. The equipment and materials are used exclusively for in situ treatment — meaning treating the soil without removing it from the site. It is especially applicable to locations like the one described in Quebec, Canada, where contamination is within an area requiring site-specific remediation without the disruption of relocating materials.
该土壤修复工艺，即土壤生物通风法，旨在对邻近敏感生态系统（例如河岸）的污染场地进行净化。所述设备和材料仅用于原位处理，即在不将土壤从现场移走的情况下进行处理。它特别适用于加拿大魁北克省北部的位置描述等场所，那里的污染区域需要特定场所的修复，并且不会因迁移材料而造成干扰。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Cadotte, M., Deschênes, L. & Samson, R. Selection of a remediation scenario for a diesel-contaminated site using LCA. Int J Life Cycle Assess 12, 239–251 (2007).
Cadotte, M., Deschênes, L. & Samson, R. Selection of a remediation scenario for a diesel-contaminated site using LCA. Int J Life Cycle Assess 12, 239–251 (2007).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set, users must take into account the location-specific nature of the soil remediation project. The data is tailored for a scenario where the contaminated area is near a water body, and transport distance to the site is defined. Attention must be paid to the transport-related energy consumption, here assumed to be by diesel gasoline, and the efficiency of material usage. Users should adjust the data if the conditions differ significantly in terms of distance, transport type, or environmental sensitivity. This data should not be genericized without proper adjustments for different scenarios.
在使用此生命周期评估数据集时，用户必须考虑到土壤修复项目的地点特定性质。数据是为接近水体的污染区域和已定义的现场运输距离量身定制的。必须关注与运输相关的能源消耗，此处假设为柴油汽油，并注意材料使用的效率。如果条件在距离、运输类型或环境敏感性方面有显著不同，用户应相应调整数据。在没有为不同情景进行适当调整的情况下，不应将此数据普遍化。

completeness.common:other: Input of diesel fuel, output of equipment and materials arriving at the site
输入柴油，输出到达现场的设备和材料

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 将所需材料和设备运至现场所需要的柴油

exchange.generalComment: 到达现场的材料和设备
